definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Low wall or story above the cornice of a classical fa?ade.
sentences.chinese: 古典建築中正面飛檐上的矮牆或矮樓。

sentences.english: Increased positive feelings and reduced feelings of anxiety, anger and sadness.
sentences.chinese: 增加正面的工作情緒，減少緊張，憤怒及懮傷。

sentences.english: Both areas have front access with pivoting doors, and are accessed via glass doors.
sentences.chinese: 兩個區域都有帶旋轉門的正面通道，通過玻璃門出入。

sentences.english: An imposing facade, building, person, personality.
If Satan can't defeat us by a frontal attack, he will do it in a more subtle way.
sentences.chinese: 撒但若不能正面攻擊我們，就會改用更巧妙的詭計。

sentences.english: Our seats are in the grandstand.
sentences.chinese: 咱們的座位在正面看臺。

sentences.english: Let's flip a coin to decide who should go first - do you want heads or tails?
sentences.chinese: 我們來拋硬幣決定誰先走吧，你是要正面還是要反面？

sentences.english: Positive energies are essentially forms of love.
sentences.chinese: 而正面能量本質上來說也都是愛。

sentences.english: They fronted the building with red brick.
sentences.chinese: 他們用紅磚裝飾建築物的正面。

sentences.english: To bend the arm at the elbow, the muscle at the front of the upper arm has to shorten and bunch up.
sentences.chinese: 要從肘部彎曲手臂，就要收縮上臂正面的肌肉。

sentences.english: The obverse shows the Huangguoshu Waterfall in Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 正面以貴州省黃果樹瀑布作主題。

sentences.english: Larger 10)amphibious assault forces attack beaches head on in massed formations.
sentences.chinese: 大型的兩棲作戰部隊以大規模編隊正面進攻海灘。

sentences.english: Then document what works based on the positive results you achieve.
sentences.chinese: 工作的文檔應該基於您達到的正面的結果。

sentences.english: The government has countered such negative reports with positive propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 政府則用正面宣傳來反駁這樣的負面報道。

sentences.english: Parents were too shy to tackle embarrassing issues such as sex head-on.
sentences.chinese: 家長羞於跟孩子正面討論諸如性這樣的尷尬問題。

sentences.english: The front panel houses a bridge-current meter .
sentences.chinese: 正面板上裝有橋式電流表。

definition: the back/the reverse side/the wrong side
reverse side/backside/the other side (of a problem etc)/negative/bad
back (of a human or other vertebrate, or of an object)
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
abbr. of 麵包車的士|面包车的士[mian4 bao1 che1 di1 shi4]/minivan taxi
model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
